title: 4-year-old's jaw-dropping drum skills viewed by millions on Facebook
text:
A 4-year-old drummer is impressing millions with his musical skills.

Seneca Whitehead's mother, Tabithia Wilcox, filmed him as he joined the drumline at a local high school football game in Georgia. The footage of Seneca showing off his talents has been viewed nearly 7 million times on .

"One of the parents saw him with the drum and she was like, 'Oh, he's so cute, can he join the drumline?' I was like, 'OK,'" Wilcox said Oct. 18 on ABC's "Strahan, Sara & Keke."

ABC

"It's awesome," she added. "He has an older brother who drums. He just picked it up from him, I guess."

ABC

Tabithia Wilcox

Wilcox said she posted the video of Seneca drumming on Oct. 6, the day of his birthday.

ABC

One week later, Seneca was surprised with his very own drum set on "Strahan, Sara & Keke."
description: The footage of Seneca Whitehead showing off his talents has been viewed nearly 7 million times on Facebook.
